markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Shield 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swordstealer Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=16)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Deflecting Slashing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=473" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 21 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Price** 6 gp

**AC Bonus** 2 

**Speed Penalty** —
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Bulk** 1

**Hardness** 4

**HP (BT)** 20 (10)
</row>

</column>

---

This specialized steel shield features several wide metal hooks along its surface. These hooks help catch swords and other blades, reducing the impact of their incoming attacks.
name: Swordstealer Shield
